easy.question: I speak without a mouth and hear without ears. I have no body, but I come alive with the wind. What am I?
The more you take, the more you leave behind. What am I?

medium.question: I am always hungry, I must always be fed. The finger I touch, will soon turn red. What am I?

hard.question: What can run but never walks, has a mouth but never talks, has a head but never weeps, has a bed but never sleeps?
